subject: RE: [junit] junit.framework.AssertionFailedError
msgSnippet: ... Hi, The FAQ covers this and related problems: http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#running_8 , 9 and 10 Scott Stirling Workscape, Inc.
messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rose, Angus H [mailto:angus.rose@...]
>
> Dear All,
> I'm currently trying to use JUnit to test a series
> of EJB methods.
> When I run the tests I get the following message:
>
> * junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Exception in constructor:
> testIJBCHome (java.lang.LinkageError: loader constraints violated when
> linking com/eds/ijb/data/IJBCriteria class

Hi,

The FAQ covers this and related problems:

http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#running_8 , 9 and 10

Scott Stirling
Workscape, Inc.
